title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: One of best and fastest BTC/altcoins exchanges - https://coinchange.to/.30+ various BTC ( all networks, even Lightning ) and altcoins - Litecoin, ETH, Dogecoin, BNB, Binance USD ( all networks ), Ripple, Solana, Tether ( all networks ), USD Coin ( all networks ) etc..No KYC or registration, fees fixed 1% or float 0.5%, fast and instant exchange - only 3 confirmations needed for exchange.Hint: give some merits in return.
